definition: to be right next to/close neighbor
next-door neighbor/neighboring household/adjacent country (short for 鄰接的國家|邻接的国家[lin2 jie1 de5 guo2 jia1])
neighbors/next-door neighbors/related work units/colleagues doing related work

sentences.english: Sea Xingxian is located in Hebei Province, southeast of Shandong Province, neighboring the point of the Bohai Sea.
sentences.chinese: 海興縣位於河北省東南部，鄰山東省，瀕渤海。

sentences.english: Bajaur shares a border with the Afghan province of Kunar.
sentences.chinese: 巴焦爾與阿富汗的庫納爾省爲鄰。

sentences.english: Objective To determine the quantity of uric protein with pyrogallol red.
sentences.chinese: 目的應用鄰苯三酚紅法測定尿蛋白。

sentences.english: The paper presents a method to recognize integral lines in scanned image of engineering drawings based on a primitive regions adjacency graph.
sentences.chinese: 給出一種基於單義域鄰按圖的完整識別線段算法。

sentences.english: Objective To study the imaging diagnosis of intraosseous ganglia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討鄰關節骨囊腫的影像學診斷。

sentences.english: The king was prepared to levy war on his neighbour after their quarrel over the land.
sentences.chinese: 國王與領國與鄰土之爭以後，就準備對鄰國宣戰。

sentences.english: Chinese ancients said, without knowing each other near and far, thousands of miles apart.
sentences.chinese: 中國古人說，相知無遠近，萬里尚爲鄰。

sentences.english: Enzyme activity was determed with the autoxidation of pyrogallol method.
sentences.chinese: 酶活力測定採用微量鄰苯三酚自氧化法。

sentences.english: The single span girders are linked with one another and freely supported on top of rigid piers.
sentences.chinese: 橋的鄰跨梁相互鉸連並自由置放在橋墩的頂面上。

sentences.english: An analysis method of nonlinear absorbance for binary composition mixture was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了苯酚和鄰氯苯酚混合體系非線性吸光度表示式。

sentences.english: A review of recent advance on novel insecticidal anthranilic diamides classified by five different structures.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了新型鄰甲酰氨基苯甲酰胺類殺蟲劑的研究進展。

sentences.english: Methods An improved pyrogallol red-molybdate complex method.
sentences.chinese: 方法改良鄰苯三酚紅鉬絡合法。

sentences.english: Li said "distance cannot separate true friends who feel so close even when they are thousands of miles apart".
sentences.chinese: 李肇星說，“相知無遠近，萬里尚爲鄰”。

sentences.english: A borough of northwest England near the Scottish border.
sentences.chinese: 英格蘭西北部一自治市鎮，鄰蘇格蘭邊界。

sentences.english: Canthus o Beijing, Tianjin, strong industrial base.
sentences.chinese: 眥鄰北京，天津，工業基礎雄厚。

sentences.english: Finally, nearest neighbor decision (NND) rule is used as recognition rule.
sentences.chinese: 最後依據最近鄰決策規則進行識別。

definition: far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)
country or countryside/native place/home village or town/township (PRC administrative unit)
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish
category/genus (taxonomy)/family members/dependents/to belong to/subordinate to/affiliated with/be born in the year of (one of the 12 animals)/to be/to prove to be/to constitute
to join together/to fix one's attention on/to concentrate on
to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
abbr. for Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]/abbr. for Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]/surname Ning
